content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the "google" command to search for "international law research resources" and received multiple links.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py", "text": "def calculate_average(numbers):\\n    total = sum(numbers)\\n    count = len(numbers)\\n    average = total / count\\n    return average\\n\\nnumbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]\\naverage = calculate_average(numbers)\\nprint(\'The average of the numbers is:\', average)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "test_average.py", "text": "from average import calculate_average\\n\\n# Test case 1\\nnumbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]\\nexpected_output = 3.0\\noutput = calculate_average(numbers)\\nassert output == expected_output, f\'Error: expected {expected_output}, but got {output}\'\\n\\n# Test case 2\\nnumbers = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0]\\nexpected_output = 0.0\\noutput = calculate_average(numbers)\\nassert output == expected_output, f\'Error: expected {expected_output}, but got {output}\'\\n\\n# Test case 3\\nnumbers = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]\\nexpected_output = 6.0\\noutput = calculate_average(numbers)\\nassert output == expected_output, f\'Error: expected {expected_output}, but got {output}\'\\n\\nprint(\'All tests passed!\')"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "test_average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\nAll tests passed!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "international law research resources"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://law.gwu.libguides.com/PIL", "https://uow.libguides.com/law/international-law-resources", "https://research.un.org/az.php?s=1520", "https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/fi-free", "https://www.law.nyu.edu/global/researchtools", "https://www.loc.gov/research-centers/law-library-of-congress/collections/digital-collections/foreign-law/", "https://www.law.nyu.edu/library/research/researchguides", "https://libguides.law.rutgers.edu/internationallaw"]', type='action_result')]
"""
